content.text:
# 1897–98 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

The 1897–98 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 10th season of existence
Season summary
In the 1897–98 season QPR competed in the London league but QPR withdrew from the London League on February 9, 1898, due to too many cup matches and having completed only four league matches, the remaining fixtures were never played. In the FA Cup, Rangers won their first tie as they beat Windsor & Eton 3–0 at home.
Results
QPR scores given first
